Database Script

The toolbox needs data, and that data needs to be in a specific format. To define this format, the user must provide a dataset (temporal, spatial, or spatio-temporal) and describe an experimental setup. The preprocessing must implemented within the dataset class, for which we provide a template based on a PyTorch wrapper, as well as several examples. Below is a description of the dataset class.

Pyod Database Template

class Dataset(torch.utils.data.Dataset):
    def __init__(self, root, split, transform=None, target_transform=None, download=False):
    # initialize the class and perform all the preprocessing

    def __getallitems__(self, index):
    # return the data and labels

Pytorch Database Template

class Dataset(torch.utils.data.Dataset):
    def __init__(self, root, split, transform=None, target_transform=None, download=False):
    # initialize the class and perform all the preprocessing

    def __getitem__(self, index):
    # return the data and labels

    def __len__(self):
    # return the size of the dataset
